website_summaries.verdict: Comfortable fabric that protects at the beach as well as high altitudes.
pros: We love the quality of the material that protects kids' skin
Customers rave about how quickly the fabric dries
cons: Hood can trap too much heat

customer_reviews.title: Great extra protection to keep on hand
customer_reviews.text: This is the third of these hoodies I've bought as my daughter has grown. I've never tested the SPF and still put suncreen on her, but in high-elevation locations or where there is intense sun it is nice to know there is this extra layer. The hood can trap quite a bit of heat though, so keep that in mind because usually where there is sun, there is also heat.
customer_reviews.author: We on E Street

customer_reviews.title: LOVE
customer_reviews.text: My son is very fair, but loves being in the pool.For this reason I usually try to find long-sleeved rash guards for him so I don't need to constantly sunscreen his arms. This even has a hood! It works great and he even likes wearing it. It does fit a little baggier than I thought it would, but that just means he will wear it longer!
customer_reviews.author: Chelsey Fox

customer_reviews.title: Great sun protection
customer_reviews.text: Amazing quality. My son wears this when I don’t have time to apply sunscreen (we live in Hawai'i and applying sunscreen every single day when at the playground, backyard, etc. is impossible. This is a great alternative and helps me feel better about my fair skinned son being protected. No sunburns with this! He is VERY rough on clothing, wears this often, and it still looks new. I never put in the dryer but wash with other clothes and never separately.
customer_reviews.author: emilysuddath

customer_reviews.title: Active 5-yo RED HEAD loves this hoodie (and I do too!!!!)
customer_reviews.text: My 5 y.o. red-head has been swimming all summer long and hasn't gotten a sunburn once. It's easy to reapply sunscreen on his face every couple of hours, and I know his ears, neck, scalp, chest, arms and shoulders are all protected by this hoodie. It isn't hot to wear even when he's playing on dry land, so it has become our go-to essential piece this summer.
customer_reviews.author: Anne W

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! The sand doesn’t get in the fabric like others I bought here on amazon, this is great and my son loved it! Ordered different colors! It is a little bit bigger than the size, but just a little so it works because it will last and it doesn’t look too big on him, just a little bit loose and he feels comfortable in it. My son is 9 years old and I have the same shirt in size 8 and a 10 and both work, the 8 was getting a little too tight but the size 10 is just perfect.
customer_reviews.author: karina verdaguer

customer_reviews.title: Really cute.
customer_reviews.text: These sun shirts are great peace of mind. My 5 and 7 year old red-heads love them. The fit is loose and comfy. The fabric is smooth and my son who is sensitive to textured fabrics absolutely loves the soft, airy feel of it on his skin.
customer_reviews.author: Erin F.

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Swim Shirt!
customer_reviews.text: This swim shirt was perfect for my 6 month old twins!! (16 lbs) It wasn't too tight on their arms like other swim shirts I have tried. It was long so it covered their entire back and stomach the whole time. The hood was big enough to cover their foreheads too! You can wash and dry it with your regular laundry! I have used it several times and have seen no areas that it looks worn out. I highly recommend this swim shirt!
customer_reviews.author: LLE

customer_reviews.title: This is such a great alternative to sunscreen
customer_reviews.text: My daughter was in an accident and burned over 20% of her skin. The doctors said that if she needs to go outside she has to have long sleeves and such protection, but she reacts badly to sunscreen. This is such a great alternative to sunscreen, without having to use other shirts that look like she should be in a swimming pool. I really value this product a LOT and my daughter wears one every time she's outdoors (unless she has her winter jacket on, at least).
customer_reviews.author: C*416

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality
customer_reviews.text: Very well made garment. So much easier than putting on sunscreen. We love the hood detail too. Will definitely purchase more as my daughter grows!
customer_reviews.author: Natalie

customer_reviews.title: Light blue is not a baby blue, more like highlighter blue
customer_reviews.text: serves it's purpose and seems nice quality, but the light blue doesn't resemble the nice baby blue in the photo, it's a definite highlighter blue.
customer_reviews.author: Jessie Ten Eyck

customer_reviews.title: It worked well to keep him cool on a hot summer day and dries quickly after ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for my 4 year old, he put it on straight away and didn't want to take it off. It worked well to keep him cool on a hot summer day and dries quickly after playing in the sprinklers.
customer_reviews.author: YAHannaway

customer_reviews.title: No more sunburn!
customer_reviews.text: Keeps my son from getting sunburned after long periods in the sun!
customer_reviews.author: Jenny Plott

customer_reviews.title: Little dinosaur outfit
customer_reviews.text: Used this as a Halloween costume! My little guy went as Yoshi from Mario Brothers. We live in Florida, and most dinosaur costumes are full-body fleece suits, which wouldn't work at all. I got this top and the matching shorts, and they were a perfect base. Now he's got an awesome dinosaur bathing suit for this summer, too.
customer_reviews.author: ErinA

customer_reviews.title: Great color.  Never faded all summer.
customer_reviews.text: Most of our sun shirts fade over the course of the summer, but not this one. It stayed gorgeous turquoise all summer. My son loved wearing the hood too, which was helpful since he hates sunscreen.
customer_reviews.author: Covahne

customer_reviews.title: breathable and comfortable. Boys wore shirts in 90 degrees with high ...
customer_reviews.text: Loose fitting, breathable and comfortable. Boys wore shirts in 90 degrees with high humidity and never got hot and protected well from uv.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: My 9 year old twins have albinism and these shirts work really well for them. No sunburn at all through the shirt.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Duarte

customer_reviews.title: My son does not like wearing hats
customer_reviews.text: My son does not like wearing hats, but will keep the hood on for short periods of time. It lasted us through the entire summer. It held up nicely after many washings. I would buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: ELS123

customer_reviews.title: Great hood size!
customer_reviews.text: Great buy. The hood is deep so it covers very well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Very nice. Less 1 star because the kids complained that it chafed when worn under the lifevest.
customer_reviews.author: Mel

customer_reviews.title: ... for my four year old sun and it's a nice loose fit
customer_reviews.text: I got a siE five for my four year old sun and it's a nice loose fit, not skin tight. The neck hole is also generous enough that I don't have to squeeze his head through. I plan to buy more colors
customer_reviews.author: Frieda

customer_reviews.title: Nice fabric
customer_reviews.text: My grandson loves purple. He loves his new rashguard shirt.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Colors not as pictured
customer_reviews.text: Ordered light blue but I would not call it light blue
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just as expected. Purchased a 2T for my 18 ...
customer_reviews.text: Just as expected. Purchased a 2T for my 18 month old so he can grow into it and use it at the beach this summer.
customer_reviews.author: Kristina

customer_reviews.title: This shirt totally lives up to what it claims.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my grandson that has excema and some sunscreens can sting his skin. He absolutely loves this shirt. Now he can go out to the pool and have a good time.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin M. Muehleisen

customer_reviews.title: fits true to size
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my great nephew and he loves it so does his parents fits great and wonderful quality
customer_reviews.author: MG

customer_reviews.title: 5 year old wears a size 4-5 depending on the brand and this fits great!
customer_reviews.text: My 4.5 year old wears a size 4-5 depending on the brand and this fits great!
customer_reviews.author: Pen Name

customer_reviews.title: Not same color as shown on picture
customer_reviews.text: All good except the color. It’s not pink as shown on picture. Is actually florescent pink and I’m just not a fan.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: He really liked it.
customer_reviews.text: Even though the top is a bit too large, my child can grow into it. He really liked it.
customer_reviews.author: me123

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it so much we’re buying a second one for this summer.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Larkin

customer_reviews.title: Very good Quality, just a bit higher price than imports
customer_reviews.text: Very good Quality, just a bit higher price than imports , but considering it was 100 Percent American Made, It was Justifiable to spend extra..
customer_reviews.author: richard b.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this brand and their rash guards are such great quality!
customer_reviews.author: MichiganMom

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Lightweight, quick dry, easy cover up for any outdoor sport/activity. Will buy more next summer for sure
customer_reviews.author: care11

customer_reviews.title: It is super hard to find plain Purple
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I wanted. My son loves it. It is super hard to find plain Purple
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Ann

customer_reviews.title: I love this sun & swim shirt
customer_reviews.text: I love this sun & swim shirt. This is the second summer I have purchased one for my son.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It fit our 3 month old perfectly with room to ...
customer_reviews.text: It fit our 3 month old perfectly with room to grow, we can't wait to use it more this summer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality purchase
customer_reviews.text: Good quality purchase. Fit pretty true to size--I was expecting it to be large like ones I have purchased at retailers and was pleasantly pleased. Would buy again
customer_reviews.author: Jenny Rex

customer_reviews.title: So far both kids have not really wanted to wear ...
customer_reviews.text: So far both kids have not really wanted to wear these, because it's been so hot, but we use these as an alternative to wearing a regular long sleeved shirt and then a runner's cap (with sun shade for the neck) when we're out exploring the forest. I am hoping that, when it starts to get cooler again, that they'll opt to wear these to protect themselves from ticks and poison ivy. Bought this in purple as well, for my daughter, this one was for my son (he's in 5T and this fits well, he's a very skinny kid)
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: This hoodie fits well and is great looking but feels like nylon - cold - and ...
customer_reviews.text: This hoodie fits well and is great looking but feels like nylon - cold - and does not absorb moisture - okay for bug repellent and wind protection but not for warmth or comfort in wet i.e. beach I mistook it for cotton and will return it for that reason
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!!! Mommy & FUN inspected and APPROVED!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is absolutely the BEST product for sun protection!! My son has an auto immune disease that requires him to have minimal sun exposure! We just spent all day at six flags with him completely covered, looking cool, and comfortable! I have already gone back and purchased the other colors!! He is all boy and played all day with no complaints of the sleeves or hood he had to wear— I actually think he just liked the hood— he wore it indoors as well! Don’t hesitate— the price is so worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Kerri Richters

product_meta.title: City Threads Boys' and Girls' SPF50+ Hood Rash Guard Sun Swimming Tee Protection
feature_bullets: Made in the USA! Quality you can trust and proudly keeping jobs local
COMFORTABLE: silky and smooth fabric that kids love
DURABLE: no cheap materials in here!
SAFE: made with safe dyes and no harsh chemicals
Made in the USA - proudly keeping jobs local!
